CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Enforcement proceedings;Article 6-1 - Access to court);Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Peaceful enjoyment of possessions)
JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Christos Rozakis;Dean Spielmann;George Nicolaou;Khanlar Hajiyev;Sverre Erik Jebens
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . The applicant worked as an inspector at ORG ( GPE şəhəri üzrə FAC the GPE ” ) of ORG ( “ the Ministry ” ) . On DATE the applicant was dismissed from his job by an order of ORG for unsatisfactory work performance .

CARDINAL . The applicant lodged an action against ORG , claiming unlawful dismissal . By a judgment of DATE ORG allowed the applicant 's claim , ordering his reinstatement in his previous job . Moreover , the court ordered ORG to pay the applicant his unpaid salary in an unspecified amount for the period from DATE ( date of dismissal ) to CARDINAL DATE ( date of delivery of the judgment ) . No appeals were lodged against the judgment of DATE within the time - limits specified by law and , pursuant to the domestic law in force at the material time , it entered into legal force DATE after its delivery .

CARDINAL . NORP Despite the applicant 's numerous demands and the fact that the writ of execution had been sent several times to ORG for execution , the competent authorities did not take any measures to enforce the judgment .

CARDINAL . By a letter of DATE the Ministry informed the applicant that , upon the reorganisation of ORG , ORG had been abolished by an internal order of DATE of ORG and that therefore it was not possible to reinstate him in his previous job .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged an action against the Ministry , seeking compensation for non - execution of the judgment of DATE . On DATE the ORG delivered a judgment in the applicant 's favour . The court noted that the judgment of DATE was still in force and awarded the applicant CARDINAL Old NORP manats ( LOC , MONEY ( ORG ) ) as his unpaid salary calculated from DATE to CARDINAL DATE ( date of delivery of this judgment ) . This amount was calculated on the basis of the applicant 's previous average salary .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant appealed against the judgment of CARDINAL DATE , claiming a higher amount of compensation . In the meantime , it appears from the case file that ORG requested ORG to suspend the proceedings due to the ORG 's cassation appeal lodged with ORG against the judgment of DATE . After the ORG 's above - mentioned request , the proceedings before ORG were formally suspended .
CARDINAL . By a judgment of CARDINAL DATE ORG upheld the firstinstance court 's judgment , noting that the amount of compensation had been calculated correctly . On DATE ORG upheld ORG judgment .
CARDINAL . On DATE the judgment of CARDINAL DATE was executed and the applicant received the amount awarded by the judgment ( approximately EUR CARDINAL ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG executed the judgment of DATE : the applicant was reinstated in his previous post and an amount of ORG ( approximately ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL ) was paid to him as compensation for lost earnings , in addition to compensation awarded by the judgment of DATE .
